main event: A bright, egg-shaped object was observed moving very fast overhead at an estimated speed of 1000 mph. The sighting lasted approximately 10-15 minutes.
interesting points: The object appeared as a large, bright white object hovering very low over a highway, moving slowly at first then speeding up rapidly.
Ground radar tracked the object for 2-3 minutes before it disappeared from view.
The object climbed straight up very rapidly and disappeared into the haze.
There were multiple sightings of similar objects in the Dayton, Ohio area in late October 1961.
The object was described as a bright, egg-shaped target moving fast overhead, with no particular details visible even with binoculars.
